description: Tight spaces giving you a problem connecting your HDMI cable? Tired of having to move your equipment just to reach those "hard to get places?" Use an HDMI port saver to save your time and efforts in your cable setup! Our HDMI port savers (male to female) give you the flexibility you'll need without risking bending your HDMI cables excessively which may damage the cable or even worse the ports on your expensive HDTV. This port saver will help ease the strain at the point of connection to eliminate damage to the HDMI ports on your television. This port saver supports 3D signals! If your port is vertically mounted and the flat side is on the left it would point downward
title: Monoprice HDMI Right Angle Port Saver Adapter (Male to Female) - 90 Degree - Vertical Flat Left
